text: Hashi guweza kutakula kwa mlongu gwaku, ‘Guleki nukuwusiyi shibandu shididini nentu mulisu lyaku,’ na gwenga gusinda kuliwona lipingiri lya mulisu lyaku? Gwa mfyangu gwenga! Kwanja guwusiyi huti lipingiri lya ligogu mulisu lyaku, ndo haguwezi kushiwusiya weri shibandu mulisu lya mlongu gwaku.
